Feral Diversion.name: Feral Diversion
Feral Diversion.flavor: Your companion draws a foe’s attention, allowing you to slip safely away.
Feral Diversion.effect: Before the attack, your beast companion can shift 3 squares.
Feral Diversion.onHit: 2[B] + beast's Strength modifier + beast's Dexterity modifier damage, and you can shift 3 squares away from the target as a free action.

Swiftness of Spirit.name: Swiftness of Spirit
Swiftness of Spirit.flavor: At your signal, your beast companion is poised for action.
Swiftness of Spirit.target: Your beast companion in the burst
Swiftness of Spirit.effect: The target takes a move action or gains a +2 bonus to its next attack roll during this encounter.

Twin-Soul Strike.name: Twin-Soul Strike
Twin-Soul Strike.flavor: Whether attacking together or apart, you coordinate your strike with the attack of your beast companion to maximize devastation.
Twin-Soul Strike.effect: Your beast companion gains combat advantage against the primary target for the next attack the beast makes against it before the end of your next turn. Then the beast makes a secondary attack.
Twin-Soul Strike.secondaryTarget: The primary target or another creature
Twin-Soul Strike.secondaryOnHit: 2[B] + beast's Strength modifier + beast's Dexterity modifier damage.
Twin-Soul Strike.secondaryeffect: If the secondary target is different from the primary target, you gain combat advantage against the secondary target for the next attack you make against it before the end of your next turn.
